participant_1.background:
I've only been at my current job for a few months, but I'm already enjoying it.
i have three roommates.
i enjoy talking to strangers.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.
my masters degree is in italian literature.

participant_2.background:
I do my laundry every week.
I don't really care about social media, I prefer to spend my time doing other things.
i like to run so that i can clear my head.
I used social media to stay connected with my friends and family during the holidays, but I didn't let it take over my life.
my favorite car is the ford mustang.

content.text: I'm doing pretty well! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you. I'm just getting over knee surgery, so I've been spending a lot of time with my dog, Snowball.
Oh no, that's rough! I'm glad to hear you're on the mend. What kind of dog is Snowball?
He's a white fluffy bichon frise. He's the sweetest dog ever.
I love bichons! They're so cute. I have a black lab named Buddy.
Labs are great dogs too! I used to have a lab when I was a kid.
I bet he was a great friend.
Well, it sounds like you're both doing well despite your recent surgery. I'm glad to hear that.
